select * from v_order where 1 = 1 and status = 1
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by orderByField ASC
order by orderByField DESC
order by create_time DESC

select o.*, s.`name` AS storeName from v_order o JOIN v_store s ON s.id = o.store_id where 1 = 1 and o.status = 1
and o.member_id = #{memberId}

select o.*, s.`name` AS storeName, i.* from v_order_item i LEFT JOIN v_order o ON o.id= i.order_id LEFT JOIN v_store s ON s.id = o.store_id where 1 = 1 and o.status = 1
and i.order_id = #{orderId}
